Sequence Information.Peptide Name: Ctry2459 (natural AMPs; XXA, UCLL1c, scorpions, arachnids, Chelicerata, arthropods, invertebrates, animals)

Literature Information.Literature: Discovery: scorpion venom peptide library screen.Sequence analysis: APD analysis reveals that this sequence is most similar (61.54%) tofrog Temporin-SHcF=L: 33%. GRAVY: 1.33; mol Wt: 1098.352; mol formula: C57H84N10O11; mol ex coeff: 0.Activity: active against S. aureus AB94004 or ATCC25923 or ATCC6538 (MIC 11.38 uM), E. coli AB94012 or ATCC25922 or  DH5alpha (MIC 45.52 uM), and P. aeruginosa ATCC9027 or PAO1 (MIC 45.52-91.04 uM).Virus:  inhibits hepatitis C virus (HCV) infection (EC50 1.84 ug/ml).Toxicity: Huh7.5.1 cells (LC50 79.8 ug/ml).MOA:virus:  it inactivated infectious viral particles.
Literature Information.Author: Hong W, Zhang R, Di Z, He Y, Zhao Z, Hu J, Wu Y, Li W, Cao Z.2013
Literature Information.Title: Design of histidine-rich peptides with enhanced bioavailability and inhibitory activity against hepatitis C virus.
